analysis.description:
BallerToken.purchase (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#436-465) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#460)

BallerToken.purchasePlayer (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#474-516) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#506)

BallerToken._withdrawAmount (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#530-536) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#534)
	- _to.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x5ccf1cb83d01312a98f5e85bfea0c8ba450f371e.sol#535)
